Model

Class CharacterDirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.CharacterDirector

  • public class CharacterDirector
extends java.lang.Object
    Director for the builder classes. It's constructor builds and initializes the necessary components and properties for a character.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CharacterDirector(CharacterBuilder pCharBuilder, java.lang.String pName, java.lang.String pPath, int pLevel)
      Constructor the the CharacterDirector class, which eventually will create a character with the mentioned properties.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void constructCharacter()
      This the constructor method for the concrete builders.
      Character getCharacter()
      It will return the character object.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CharacterDirector

        public CharacterDirector(CharacterBuilder pCharBuilder,
                 java.lang.String pName,
                 java.lang.String pPath,
                 int pLevel)
        Constructor the the CharacterDirector class, which eventually will create a character with the mentioned properties.
        Parameters:
        pCharBuilder - It's the concrete builder object, which will be sent to the constructor method.
        pName - Name of the character.
        pPath - Image path/location for the avatar.
        pLevel - Defines the level for the character.

        It will return the character object.
